exm.mng: Ptolemy or Claudius Ptolemaeus (c. 90-c. 168), Alexandrian Greek astronomer, mathematician and geographer, author of the Almagest 天文學大成|天文学大成, see also 托勒密[Tuo1 le4 mi4]
A rose by any other name (would smell as sweet)
exm.pyn: méi guī bù guǎn jiào shá míng

exm.cur: 玫瑰不管叫啥名，闻起来总是香的
exm.trd: 玫瑰不管叫啥名，聞起來總是香的
exm.mng: A rose by any other name would smell as sweet
exm.pyn: méi guī bù guǎn jiào shá míng , wén qǐ lai zǒng shì xiāng de
